pkgmetadata.longdescription:
stalcraft-api unofficial python library


Official API documentation: https://eapi.stalcraft.net

Before you can use the API, you must register your application and receive approval

For testing Demo API is available

more about applications


# ðŸ”§ Install### Pip```consolepip install stalcraft-api --upgrade```
Manual```consolegit clone git@github.com:onejeuu/stalcraft-api.git``````consolecd stalcraft-api``````consolepip install -r requirements.txt```


# âš¡ Quick Start```pythonfrom stalcraft import AppClientTOKEN = "YOUR_TOKEN"client = AppClient(token=TOKEN)```

# ðŸš« Exceptions```Exceptionâ”œâ”€â”€ InvalidTokenâ”œâ”€â”€ StalcraftApiExceptionâ”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ Unauthorisedâ”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ InvalidParameterâ”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ NotFoundâ”‚ â””â”€â”€ RateLimitExceptionâ””â”€â”€ ItemException â”œâ”€â”€ ListingJsonNotFound â””â”€â”€ ItemIdNotFound```

# ðŸ”‘ Tokens```pythonfrom stalcraft import AuthorizationCLIENT_ID = "YOUR_CLIENT_ID"CLIENT_SECRET = "YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET"auth = Authorization(client_id=CLIENT_ID, client_secret=CLIENT_SECRET)```
Get App Token```pythonprint()print("Get App Token")print(auth.get_app_token())```

Get User Token```pythonprint()print("Get User Code")print(auth.user_code_url)auth.input_code()# or# auth.code = "USER_CODE"print()print("Get User Token")print(auth.get_user_token())```

Refresh User Token```pythonREFRESH_TOKEN = "USER_REFRESH_TOKEN"print()print("Refresh User Token")print(auth.update_token(REFRESH_TOKEN))```


# ðŸ“‹ Output Formats```pythonfrom stalcraft import AppClientTOKEN = "YOUR_TOKEN"client = AppClient(token=TOKEN)print()print("Object:")print(client.emission())client.json = True# or# client = AppClient(TOKEN, json=True)print()print("Json:")print(client.emission())```### Output:```pythonObject:Emission( current_start=None, previous_start=datetime.datetime(2023, 1, 30, 12, 0, 0, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), previous_end=datetime.datetime(2023, 1, 30, 12, 5, 0, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc))Json:{ 'previousStart': '2023-01-30T05:16:52Z', 'previousEnd': '2023-01-30T05:21:52Z'}```
